name: Fidel
greetingText: I really hate your name btw!
wishText: I really Hope you have a great time in SA man! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday man, Thank you for always being there for me and for helping me out of many situations, thank you for helping me study,for pushing me. I really love,trust and appreciate you DUUUDE!...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something...
outroText: Okay, I wanted to celebrate you on your behalf.
replayText: because I'm really glad you exist.
